result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Whitney Jo Adrian

records.addlTxt: Pre-trial/scheduling conference on January 5, 2023 at 09:30 am.

AMENDED

$2,500 on file

- Absolute sobriety:  Zero alcohol, zero controlled substances, zero prescribed medications (except as taken and prescribed for you by a physician) in your system, on your person, or in your possession at all times while this case is ongoing. This prohibition includes drug paraphernalia. Testing upon reasonable suspicion or at the Court's directive. All costs associated with testing shall be the responsibility of the defendant.

9:07 AM Crt Comm: Timothy C. Heckmann, RPR: Melstrom, Clk: K. Anderson, Attorney Holly Rockow in court for State of Wisconsin,  Attorney Nicholas M Zimmerman in court for Whitney Jo Adrian. Defendant Whitney Jo Adrian in court. Atty. Zimmerman requests additional STC, DE anticipates entering treatment. DE confirms address. Court sets PSC.  Atty. Zimmerman requests bond modification. ADA Rockow requests Atty. Zimmerman file bond motion in advance of a modification. Atty. Zimmerman responds. Court modifies bond. Adjourned: 9:11 AM. kma
Pre-trial/scheduling conference scheduled for January 5, 2023 at 08:30 am.
Pre-trial/scheduling conference on January 5, 2023 at 08:30 am.
Filed by Atty Zimmerman. arc
Filed by ADA Becker. arc    to Atty Zimmerman.
Def appeared and signed amended bond per RMW order signed on 9/7/22. sf

AMENDED
- Absolute sobriety:  Zero alcohol, zero controlled substances, zero prescribed medications (except as taken and prescribed for you by a physician) in your system, on your person, or in your possession at all times while this case is ongoing. This prohibition includes drug paraphernalia. Testing upon reasonable suspicion or at the Court's directive. All costs associated with testing shall be the responsibility of the defendant. 

I understand that I must report to and comply with all terms, conditions, and protocols of the St. Croix County Justice Support Center. I further understand that I am required to be fitted with a GPS monitoring device with a restriction to be within a 100 mile radius from St. Croix County Courthouse. Failure to report and/or comply with conditions and/or protocols may result in a report to the District Attorney's Office, an arrest warrant, and/or referral for criminal charges.

I understand that I must IMMEDIATELY report to the Justice Support Center located adjacent to the lower parking lot of the St. Croix County Government Center. If after regular business hours I must call (715)245-4109 to schedule an appointment with the Justice Support Center by the end of the following business day.
to Modify Bond signed by RMW on 9/7/22; to extend the GPS restriction to a 100 - mile radius from St. Croix County Government Center.  c: SCSO. sf

Pretrial Assessment Report. SEALED w/ access to parties.  gll

Absolute sobriety:  Zero alcohol, zero controlled substances, zero prescribed medications (except as taken and prescribed for you by a physician) in your system, on your person, or in your possession at all times while this case is ongoing. This prohibition includes drug paraphernalia. Testing upon reasonable suspicion or at the Court's directive. All costs associated with testing shall be the responsibility of the defendant. 

I understand that I must report to and comply with all terms, conditions, and protocols of the St. Croix County Justice Support Center. I further understand that I am required to be fitted with a GPS monitoring device with a restriction to be within a 50 mile radius from St. Croix County Courthouse. Failure to report and/or comply with conditions and/or protocols may result in a report to the District Attorney's Office, an arrest warrant, and/or referral for criminal charges.

I understand that I must IMMEDIATELY report to the Justice Support Center located adjacent to the lower parking lot of the St. Croix County Government Center. 

If after regular business hours I must call (715)245-4109 to schedule an appointment with the Justice Support Center by the end of the following business day.

1:18 PM CO: RMW , REP: Melstrom, CLERK: Lindabaur. Prosecuting attorney Holly Elkin Rockow in court for the State of Wisconsin.  Attorney Stephanie Kay Schmidt in court for Defendant for today. Defendant Whitney Jo Adrian appeared by video, in custody.  DE confirms address and DOB. DE understands charges and possible penalties. Waive reading. DE does qualify for PD. Bond argument. Court orders bond. Waive speedy prelim. Court sets PH.  gll
Preliminary hearing scheduled for August 31, 2022 at 02:00 pm.
Preliminary hearing on August 31, 2022 at 02:00 pm.
